question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "With white supremacists running for office, can we state this as proof of systemic racism?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "\u201cWith gangs shooting people in Compton, can we state this as proof that black people are evil?\u201d", "modifiers": {"bold": true, "italic": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "\u201cWith that Asian driver that cut me off the other day, can we state this as proof that Asians\u2019 eyes are too small for driving properly?\u201d", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "\u201cWith the number of Taco Bell locations opening up in the USA, can we state this as proof that Mexicans are inundating this country?\u201d", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "No? Then why the hell would you even ask this question?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Pretty much anyone born in America over the age of 35 with a clean record can run for president. Even if a blatant racist (let\u2019s ignore Trump for now, as it\u2019s a long winded debate) became POTUS, it would ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "still ", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": "have nothing to do with systemic racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "You know what is systemic racism? Slavery. Jim Crow Laws. Japanese Internment Camps. Those were systemically racist policies.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "If you show me a law or public policy that is inherently ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "racist", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": ", I will fight it with you. I abhor racism. But you can\u2019t just point to a vague idea that is irrelevent and arguably false altogether, and expect me to take you seriously.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
